Ext.namespace("Ext.cfo.user.cash");Ext.cfo.user.cash.g_url="cfo/user_cash.do";Ext.cfo.user.cash.extWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{params:{},constructor:function(){this.form=new Ext.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",autoHeight:true,border:false,bodyStyle:"padding:5px;",labelWidth:65,items:[{xtype:"fjs-store-radio",name:"Suffix",fieldLabel:"文件类型",dictId:"system.export.excel",groupcfg:{name:"Suffix"}}]});Ext.cfo.user.cash.extWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-excel",title:"Excel 格式",width:320,autoHeight:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){this.params.action="export";this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.cfo.user.cash.g_url,params:this.params,success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))},apply_success:function(form,opts){Ext.fjs.download("/down.php?filename="+opts.result.message);this.window_close()}});Ext.cfo.user.cash.sumWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{params:{},constructor:function(grid){this.grid=grid;this.form=new Ext.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",layout:"html",layoutConfig:{css:"fjs-form",template:"cfo/cash_gather.tpl"},style:"padding:0px",items:[{xtype:"displayfield",name:"SKEY"},{xtype:"displayfield",name:"TMA"},{xtype:"displayfield",name:"TMB"},{xtype:"displayfield",name:"TMC"}]});Ext.cfo.user.cash.sumWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"mnu-calendar",title:"汇总信息",width:380,autoHeight:true,border:false,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"关闭",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.form.getForm().reset();this.hide()},open:function(btn){this.params.action="gather";this.form.getForm().load(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.cfo.user.cash.g_url,params:this.params,show:true,scope:this}))}});Ext.cfo.user.cash.MainPanel=Ext.extend(Ext.grid.GridPanel,{constructor:function(){this.okBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"同意",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.ok_onclick,scope:this});this.disBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"拒绝",tooltip:"请选择一行",disabled:true,handler:this.dis_onclick,scope:this});this.outBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-excel",text:"导出提现",tooltip:"导出提现",disabled:false,handler:this.out_onclick,scope:this});this.extBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-excel",text:"导出",tooltip:"导出",disabled:false,handler:this.export_onclick,scope:this});this.sumBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"mnu-calendar",text:"汇总",tooltip:"汇总信息",disabled:false,handler:this.gather_onclick,scope:this});var sm=new Ext.grid.CheckboxSelectionModel();var cm=new Ext.grid.ColumnModel([sm,new Ext.grid.RowNumber()<s:header id="cfo.user.cash"/>]);this.store=new Ext.fjs.PageStore({url:Ext.cfo.user.cash.g_url,baseParams:{action:"list"},fields:[<s:fields id="cfo.user.cash"/>]});this.store.load({params:{start:0,limit:Ext.fjs.defPSize}});Ext.cfo.user.cash.MainPanel.superclass.constructor.call(this,{region:"center",store:this.store,stripeRows:true,autoScroll:true,boldHeader:true,closable:true,containerScroll:true,columnLines:true,cm:cm,sm:sm,loadMask:true,tbar:[this.fsel=new Ext.fjs.form.StoreComboBox({xtype:"fjs-store-combo",hiddenName:"fsel",dictId:"cfo.cash.state",allowBlank:true,allrec:true,value:-1,width:85}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.fkey=new Ext.form.TextField({xtype:"textfield",name:"fkey",width:100,maxLength:50}),{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},{iconCls:"btn-search",tooltip:"查询",handler:this.search_onclick,scope:this},"->",this.okBtn,"-",this.disBtn,"-",this.outBtn,"-",this.sumBtn,"-",this.extBtn],bbar:Ext.fjs.PageToolBar({store:this.store})});this.getSelectionModel().on("selectionchange",this.evt_selection,this);this.on("rowdblclick",this.mod_onclick,this)},evt_selection:function(sm){var len=sm.getCount();if(len>=1){this.okBtn.enable()}else{this.okBtn.disable()};if(len==1){this.disBtn.enable()}else{this.disBtn.disable()}},getSid:function(){return Ext.fjs.getPKId(this,"SID")},getWin:function(){if(!this.extWin){this.extWin=new Ext.cfo.user.cash.extWindow()};return this.extWin},refresh:function(){this.getBottomToolbar().doRefresh()},search_onclick:function(){var s=this.store;s.setBaseParam("STATE",this.fsel.getValue()||-1);s.setBaseParam("KEY",this.fkey.getValue());s.load({params:{start:0,limit:this.getBottomToolbar().pageSize}})},gather_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.sumWin;if(!w){this.sumWin=w=new Ext.cfo.user.cash.sumWindow(this)};w.params.STATE=(this.fsel.getValue()||-1);w.params.KEY=this.fkey.getValue();w.open(btn)},ok_onclick:function(btn){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.cfo.user.cash.g_url,params:{action:"agree",ids:this.getSid()},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})},dis_onclick:function(btn){Ext.fjs.post({url:Ext.cfo.user.cash.g_url,params:{action:"refuse",sid:this.getSid()},success:this.apply_success,scope:this})},out_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.getWin();w.params.ids="out";w.show(btn.id)},apply_success:function(res,opts){var rs=Ext.decode(res.responseText);if(rs.success){this.refresh()}else{Ext.fjs.showError(rs.message)}},export_onclick:function(btn){var w=this.getWin();w.params.ids=this.getSid();w.show(btn.id)},beforeDestroy:function(){if(this.extWin)Ext.destroy(this.extWin);if(this.sumWin)Ext.destroy(this.sumWin);Ext.cfo.user.cash.MainPanel.superclass.beforeDestroy.call(this)}});
